name: LDL_Lab_Grouping
title: LDL_Lab_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for LDL.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the LDL utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the LDL utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the LDL utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the LDL utilization in patients/users connected health.)

contains.display: Lipoprotein, blood, high resolution fractionation and quantitation of lipoproteins, including all five major lipoprotein classes and subclasses of HDL, LDL, and VLDL by vertical auto profile ultracentrifugation
Low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Cholesterol in LDL [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by calculation
Serum low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Serum fasting low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Serum random low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Plasma random low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Plasma fasting low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma ultracentrifugate
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Direct assay
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Lipid panel results documented and reviewed (must include total cholesterol, HDL-C, triglycerides and calculated LDL-C) (CAD)
Most recent LDL-C less than 100 mg/dL (CAD) (DM)
Most recent LDL-C 100-129 mg/dL (CAD) (DM)
Most recent LDL-C greater than or equal to 130 mg/dL (CAD) (DM)
Plasma low density lipoprotein cholesterol measurement (procedure)
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass or Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Cholesterol in LDL [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma by calculation
Cholesterol in LDL real size pattern [Identifier] in Serum or Plasma
Cholesterol in LDL pattern BII [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
Cholesterol in LDL pattern BI [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Electrophoresis
Cholesterol in LDL.narrow density [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Cholesterol.in LDL (real) [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by VAP
Cholesterol.in LDL.small dense [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Calculated by Martin-Hopkins
Cholesterol.in LDL.small dense [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
